_header: Madame your men said they would ride
_description: ‘To the Quene’ by William Dunbar: a warning against catching the pox — seven 5-line stanzas incl. refr. phrase, ‘…of þe pockis’

CULLl510.First Lines:
Madame ȝour men said þai wald rydAnd lett þis
                    fasternis evin ouer slyd…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…And be war with þat perralouse playThat men callis
                    libbing of þe pockis
CULLl510.Note:
7 x 5, aabab, with refrain, ‘…libbin of þe
                    pockis’.

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Madame ȝour men said þai wald rydand latt þis
                    fasterennis ewin ower slyd…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…and be war with þat perrellous playþat men callis
                    libbin of þe pockis
